name: Route 666 (Polias Games)
description:
Five friends set out down historic Route 66 on a trip to Vegas. Depending on your choices, they run into a variety of problems along the way, all centered around one ghost town. Help your friends or hurt them; solve the mysteries of the town or get out as fast as you can.

Either way, be sure to get your kicks on Route 66!

---

Chapters 1  & 2 out now - Chapter 3 will be out Halloween 2022.
Full game will include 5 chapters - subject to increase!

Two unique endings for Chapter 2 dependent on player choices.

Original music, assets and story.

---


solo developer: PoliasGames
made in Ren'py
music made with Garageband
assets made in Procreate
videos made with Alight Motion and iMovie
